execution_plan.description: Get distinct pairs of customer_id and product_id for all purchased order items by joining Orders and Order_Items (produces the set of buyer-product relations).
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT o.customer_id, oi.product_id FROM Orders o JOIN Order_Items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id;

execution_plan.description: Get first names for the customers identified in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT customer_id, customer_first_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN ($step1.customer_id);

execution_plan.description: Get product names for the products identified in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, product_name FROM Products WHERE product_id IN ($step1.product_id);
